title: Essex National Heritage Area: Park Home
body: Colonial Settlements, Maritime Adventures and Centuries of American Growth  The Essex National Heritage Area begins just 10 miles north of Boston and covers 500 square miles of eastern Massachusetts to the New Hampshire border. The Area includes hundreds of historical sites, miles of intact landscapes, glistening coastal regions and lifetimes of rich experiences that chronicle the history of our region and of our nation.              Plan Your Visit   Learn what to do and where to go when you visit!
